fields.title: Mzansi Street Feast
fields.description: A big ol’ platter of boerewors bites, peri-peri chicken wings, mini vetkoek sliders, and spiced chakalaka dip.

fields.title: Global Graze Board
fields.description: From Italy to India: focaccia slices, butter chicken skewers, halloumi fries, and Thai sweet chili prawns.

fields.title: Carnivore’s Kingdom
fields.description: Flame-grilled ribs, peri-peri thighs, lamb sosaties, and smoky corn on the cob.

fields.title: Seafood Safari
fields.description: Calamari rings, tempura prawns, mussel bake, and creamy garlic dip with fresh lemon.

fields.title: Veggie Victory Platter
fields.description: Grilled veggie kebabs, falafel balls, spinach-and-feta phyllo rolls, and spicy hummus.

fields.title: Sweet & Savoury Street Mix
fields.description: Sticky wings, mini vetkoeks, churros, and cinnamon-sugar popcorn.

fields.title: Peri-Peri Party Board
fields.description: Peri chicken skewers, peri potato wedges, peri prawns, and peri dipping sauce (peri-peri overload!).

fields.title: Braai Buddy Board
fields.description: A braai-style mix of boerewors, lamb chops, mielies, and tangy tomato relish.

fields.title: Little Flava Feast
fields.description: Kid-friendly mix: chicken strips, mini burgers, sweet potato fries, and rainbow fruit skewers.

fields.title: The Great Greed Platter
fields.description: Designed for one very hungry person: full rack ribs, loaded fries, two cheese-stuffed vetkoeks.

fields.title: StreetGreens Mezze
fields.description: Pita, tzatziki, hummus, marinated olives, dolmades, and grilled halloumi.

fields.title: Wings & Things
fields.description: 20 sticky wings, potato skins, onion rings, and creamy ranch dip.

fields.title: Land & Sea Combo
fields.description: Half rack BBQ ribs, peri prawns, garlic bread, and crunchy slaw.

fields.title: Around the Fire Platter
fields.description: Pap balls, chicken sosaties, lamb riblets, and spicy spinach.

fields.title: Street Taco Spread
fields.description: 12 soft tacos (choice of chicken, beef, or veggie), salsa, guac, and sour cream.

fields.title: Mediterranean Market Board
fields.description: Stuffed vine leaves, lamb koftas, feta & olive salad, pita, and hummus.

fields.title: Bunny Bite Board
fields.description: Mini bunny chows with curry fillings (chicken, lamb, and bean).

fields.title: Beer Buddy Platter
fields.description: Jalapeño poppers, crumbed mushrooms, mini sausages, and cheesy fries.

fields.title: Cheese & Charcuterie Street Style
fields.description: Local cheeses, cured meats, fruit preserves, and artisanal crackers.

fields.title: The Mega Mzansi
fields.description: A giant tray of peri-peri chicken, boerewors, wings, ribs, chips, and slaw – serves 4–5.
